segments.text: I see the little boy reaching for the cookie jar, his excitement palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s almost on tiptoe, and I can’t help but admire his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice the way the stool is tilting and it makes me feel anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? The image of him crashing down makes my stomach twist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be encouraging him, her arm raised eagerly for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s sweet how they’re working together, but it’s also wildly irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen, typically a haven of warmth, feels fraught with potential danger right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
